casebody.data:
Keaton
v.
ERMC III, et al. 262P16-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. July 13, 2016 M. Duane Jones, Attorney at Law, Joseph D. Delfino, Attorney at Law, Charlotte, for ERMC III, et al. Shannon Warf Wilson, Attorney at Law, for Keaton, Ronald G.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 12th of July 2016 by Defendants for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 13th of July 2016."
